item.description: THE HALIFAX ENTRANCE IS CLOSED. Â WE WILL USE THE HANSON ENTRANCE ON HAWKS AVENUE. I WILL TRY TO GO THERE ON SATURDAY AND REPORT FURTHER DIRECTIONS.
item.how_to_find_us: There is no street number for the Burrage Pond entrance on Hawks Avenue. Hawks ave. is a right off Pleasant St. and the entrance to Burrage is almost immediately on the leftft.

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Sunday at Burrage Pond at 10am/CHANGE TO HANSON ENTRANCE!!!!!!
